title: Comprehensive agix documentation guides
description: Create detailed how-to guides for agix features to help users understand configuration, usage patterns, and best practices. Organize guides by feature category with real-world examples, troubleshooting, and common patterns.

tasks.title: Create Cost Tracking & Budget guide (examples, cost calculation, monitoring)
Create Intelligence & Optimization guide (smart routing, semantic cache, context compression, A/B testing)
Create Safety & Control guide (firewall, response policy, quality gate, session overrides)
Create Observability guide (tracing, audit logging, doctor checks, dashboard)
Create Reliability & Scale guide (failover chains, rate limiting, alerts, webhooks)
Create Advanced Features guide (prompt injection, tool bundles, PostgreSQL backend)
Create Troubleshooting and FAQs page with common issues and solutions

audit_log.reason: User requested comprehensive how-to guides for agix features to complement the updated README and help users understand configuration and usage patterns
Feature branch created, starting comprehensive guides

All 7 guides completed: cost-tracking, intelligence-optimization, safety-control, observability, reliability-scale, advanced-features, troubleshooting. Plus guides index. Total 3087 lines of comprehensive documentation with real-world examples. Feature branch merged (05b25e7)
